graph_title: Emploi dans l’industrie manufacturière, en proportion de l’emploi total
indicator_name: Emploi dans l’industrie manufacturière, en proportion de l’emploi total
SDG_GOAL: Goal 9: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
SDG_TARGET: Target 9.2: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry's share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 9.2.2: Manufacturing employment as a proportion of total employment
STAT_CONC_DEF: This indicator presents the share of manufacturing employment in total employment.
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 9: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 9.2: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry's share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 9.2.2: Manufacturing employment as a proportion of total employment
source_url_text_1: "Statistics Canada. Table 14-10-0202-01  Employment by industry, annual"
